        public void onPathSuccess(zombie.sledgehammer.npc.NPC npc,
                          zombie.ai.astar.Mover mover,
                          zombie.ai.astar.Path path)
        Fired when the NPC has successfully reached the destination of the Path.
        Parameters:
        npc - The NPC to act.
        mover - The Mover that is executing the path-finding process.
        path - The Path that is projected for the NPC to move.
